meanings.definition: An online discussion forum where users can post and read messages on a particular topic.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy participating in newsgroups about cooking recipes.
meanings.sent2: She found helpful advice on gardening in various newsgroups.
meanings.sent3: The newsgroups on pet care always make me smile with their funny stories.
meanings.sent4: In the vast sea of information, newsgroups are like beacons guiding us to knowledge.
meanings.sent5: Joining newsgroups opened up a world of learning opportunities for me.

meanings.definition: A group of related newsgroups on a specific subject or theme.
meanings.sent1: The newsgroups dedicated to technology cover a wide range of topics.
meanings.sent2: Members of the photography newsgroups often share their stunning images.
meanings.sent3: The newsgroups about travel destinations sparked my wanderlust.
meanings.sent4: Within the vast network of newsgroups, the music-related ones form a harmonious choir.
meanings.sent5: Exploring different newsgroups helped me find my niche in the online community.
